text:
Mena Massoud (; born 17 September 1991) is an Egyptian-Canadian actor. He is known for starring as Aladdin in the Disney fantasy movie "Aladdin" (2019).
He also starred as Jared Malik in the Canadian drama series "Open Heart" (2015), Tarek Kassar in the Amazon Prime series "Jack Ryan" (2018), and as Ethan Hart in the Hulu series "Reprisal" (2019).
